name: _transfer
description:
=============================================

A blinking light in the dark--a dim sound of buzzing and whirring--

>>"Is there anybody out there?" the computer asks.

>>"Yes," you respond.

>>"Who are you?" the computer asks.

You do not remember.

=============================================

_transfer is a queer narrative game about computers, identity, and what happens after you no longer understand who you are. It is meant to be short and highly replayable, taking an average of 4-10 minutes per playthrough where each can culminate in wildly different outcomes.

::this game contains aggressive flashing lights, as well as sexual and violent imagery::
